text: Sinna, deffir u$ilif, Issers awen d laman, ives id i$lin $ef urbaa segwen. Ni$ arbaa peebbioen $ef yiman nnsen, nnwan, $ef Oebbi, ayen ur nelli d tidep, nnwaya n at war tussna. Qqaoen: "day illa wayen i $ iaanan, di lameo"? Ini: "s tidep, lameo akw i Oebbi". Teffren, deg iman nnsen, ayen ur ak mmalen. Qqaoen: "lemmer illi wayen i $ iaanan, di lameo, ur nepwan$a dagi". Ini: "xas ma tellam deg ixxamen nnwen, wid i$ef tura tmen$iwt, a ten tawev s imieoeen nnsen. Iwakken ad Ijeooeb Oebbi i illan deg idmaren nnwen, ad Izzizdeg i illan deg ulawen nnwen. Oebbi Ieoa i illan deg idmaren
